definitions.definition: A form of tuberculosis , most common in women 30-40 years of age, tending to cause enlarged and degenerated lymph nodes , especially in the neck , and often chronic , intractable skin inflammation as well.

main_definition: ( pathology ) A form of tuberculosis , most common in women 30-40 years of age, tending to cause enlarged and degenerated lymph nodes , especially in the neck , and often chronic , intractable skin inflammation as well.
